experienceData.contentHtml:
ScoreShuttle is a service that helps manage credit and dispute management automatically. It helps users review their credit score, dispute credit inaccuracies, and protect credit data.

At ScoreShuttle I was a Jr. Software Engineer and worked on the following things:

  • Added new routes to the RESTful API for credit management services
  • Created administrator tools to manage customer accounts, get sales data, and allow for 3rd parties to be added to the service
  • Fixed a bug in the email template API to correctly format and send emails to customers

Technologies used:

  • TypeScript
  • Hapi.js
  • Sequelize.js
  • PostgreSQL
  • Visual Studio Code
  • Insomnia
experienceData.title: ScoreShuttle
